Parameter query Function

Function query data from NASA Exoplanet Archive and return planet parameters.

parameterquery.query_parameters(system_name)

Query function

Queries NASA Exoplanet archive and obtains system parameters for desired system

Parameters:

system_name (string) – system to query parameters for

Returns:

radii of planets in system orbital_period (array): orbital periods of planets in system semi_major_axis (array): semimajor axes of planets in system planet_mass (array): masses of planets in system eccentricity (array): eccentricities of planets in system stellar_radius (float): radius of star in system stellar_temp (float): temperature of star in system number_of_planets (int): number of planets in system

Return type:

planet_radius (array)
